title: Embattled fashion house Burberry reveals massive overhaul sending shares to an all-time high
content: Burberry is aiming to boost waning sales by refocusing on heritage designs and statement pieces under sweeping revamp plans announced Thursday.

title: Trump victory may provide TikTok a lifeline to remain in the U.S.

title: Tech giants are investing in 'sovereign AI' to help Europe cut its dependence on the U.S.
